text: Julio César Trujillo Vásquez (25 March 1931 - 19 May 2019) was an Ecuadorian lawyer and politician. He was born in Ibarra, Ecuador. He was a member of the National Congress from 1979 to 1984. From 2018 until his death, he was President of the Council of Citizen Participation and Social Control. Trujillo died on 19 May 2019 from problems caused by a cerebral hemorrhage in Quito at the age of 88.Julio César Trujillo, un defensor de los derechos y la democracia, falleció ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Ecuadorian politicians Category:Ecuadorian lawyers
title: Julio César Trujillo
